animeDescription: Music video for the song Ame no Chi Special by Mariko Kouda that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program. The video features animation by Fumio Ooi, blended with live footage of scenery.
animeStaff: [['Matsubara Miki', ['Theme Song Composition']], ['Kouda Mariko', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Nishiwaki Tatsuya', ['Theme Song Arrangement']], ['Ooi Fumio', ['Animation Director']]]
